news.title: How to submit a successful grant proposal with MetaMask Grants DAO
news.subtitle: Learn tips from the MetaMask Grants DAO team to optimize your chances of getting a grant when applying for funding.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
If you’re a developer building impactful, open experiences in web3, you might be eligible to apply for a grant to fund your project from MetaMask Grants DAO. This post outlines what MetaMask Grants DAO is and how to submit a successful grant application.

What is MetaMask Grants DAO and how does it work?


MetaMask Grants DAO is an internal Consensys employee-led DAO that aims to foster innovation in the MetaMask ecosystem. Established in October 2022, the DAO places an emphasis on builders and their journey to MVP.

Making MetaMask the most extensible wallet in the world requires decentralizing efforts to build out a thriving ecosystem to empower our communities. MetaMask Grants DAO not only accelerates growth for crypto-comfortable users but also aims to promote long-term adoption among crypto-curious individuals by providing multiple pathways for participation.

Every ConsenSys employee can opt-in to be a Grants DAO member with equal voting rights governed by a non-transferable token. Learn more about the DAO here.

How do I apply?


You can apply for a MetaMask grant here: https://consensys-software.typeform.com/to/TQ9ua2g2

Recipients include projects that have previously collaborated with MetaMask as well as new relationships formed as a result of the DAO.

We’ll use information from a prior grant recipient, Safeheron as an example in this guide.

To increase your chances of being funded, make sure to keep these 3 tips in mind when filling out your application:

#1 Be specific about your project and the problem you solve


Make sure you’re able to describe your project clearly. What are your goals, why is it important, and how does it align with our mission? Does it fit into our current wish list?

In Safeheron’s application, they clearly stated how their project revolved around improving MetaMask’s key management experience, specifically with a focus on helping users manage their Secret Recovery Phrase (SRP) to reduce phishing attacks while also reducing the chance of those keys being lost.

This is an extremely important issue to the MetaMask team as we prioritize user security above all else.

When filling out your grant application, don’t hesitate to include the following:

  • Data: Do you have quantitative data to illustrate the problem you’re solving?
  • Track record: What have you and your team been involved with? Have you participated in one of our hackathons? Collaborated with our team in the past? Let us know! Safeheron mentioned their previous relationship with the MetaMask and Keystone team in implementing a 2/2 MPC snap and described how a grant would fund the evolution of this into a 2/3 MPC snap.
  • Roadmap: What is your vision and what part of your roadmap and execution will our grant enable? Feel free to call out future steps, but be clear in delineating what portion of your project the grant will be funding.

#2 Include key milestones and a path to production


Including milestones, timelines, and a thorough strategy helps us evaluate the feasibility of your project. And maybe we can even fund a portion of your build, so be explicit in your milestones. Be realistic when sketching this out— what targets would you measure your productivity by? What does success look like? Does it make sense to break out your path to production by dev weeks or by milestones achieved?

Milestones, for example, could look like this:

  • 2/2 MPC solution implemented with MetaMask Flask and Keystone hardware wallet
  • Compatible 2/3 MPC algorithm developed
  • Designs for the 2/3 MPC experience
  • Integration of 2/3 MPC algorithm with Flask, Keystone, and MetaMask Mobile
  • Security review
  • Marketing and PR preparation
  • Launch

#3 Clearly describe how the budget would be used


What would the funding go towards? What are some blocks you’re currently experiencing? Include cost breakdowns so there’s an understanding of where the grant could contribute best.

For example, if you’re requesting funding for $35,000 how much of that will be used for development costs, security audits, marketing, etc.? We commonly see that audit fees can be a point of pressure for teams, so feel free to get an application in, even if it’s just to cover audit costs.

Making an impact


MetaMask Grants DAO was funded to enable and empower the developer ecosystem to keep building, innovating, and thriving. If you believe your project is making a positive impact and would benefit from a grant, we encourage you to apply for funding!

Keep tabs on our MetaMask Grants DAO page, and stay up to date on our developer offerings on Twitter. We’re looking forward to seeing what you build.

We can’t guarantee when we will review your request or that it will get approved, but know that our team will review the application pipeline as often as we can. Thanks for being patient with us.

Thank you to the Safeheron team for letting us use your application as an example in this guide.

nodes.title: How to sell crypto for cash
nodes.subtitle: Discover the ways MetaMask makes selling crypto easy, quick, and safe.

image.title: How to sell crypto with MetaMask
image.description: MetaMask makes selling cryptocurrencies fast, easy, and secure. With low fees and seamless off-ramping.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Selling crypto for cash is as simple as can be with MetaMask. You can exchange crypto from MetaMask wallet directly to your debit card, credit card, PayPal, or bank account. No unnecessary steps, no excess fees, no worries.

Below, we'll give you an overview of how we make MetaMask wallet powerful, secure, and configurable when you sell cryptocurrencies. Then, you'll find videos and step-by-step guides showing you exactly how to sell crypto with MetaMask on your browser or mobile app.

Let's get into it! 🦊

How MetaMask empowers you when selling crypto

  • Sell directly from your wallet, and send cash to the place that works for you.
  • Choose the best quote for selling crypto, curated from our industry-leading providers.
  • Avoid centralized exchanges, extra steps, and additional costs.
  • Select your country and choose from a range of available payment methods.
  • Buy crypto, use crypto, and sell crypto. All in one place.

How MetaMask wallet keeps you secure when selling crypto

  • Get 24/7 help whenever you need it from our expert customer service team.
    • We only work with trusted providers, ensuring that they comply with applicable regulations and are legitimate, responsible parties.
  • Preserving your privacy is paramount: MetaMask does not store — nor do we have access to — any personal information you provide when buying or selling crypto, such as payment details, personal data, or email addresses.
  • Unlike a centralized exchange, neither MetaMask nor our partners have access to the cryptocurrencies after you purchase or transfer them, meaning you can access your assets immediately without a holding period.

How MetaMask wallet gives you choice when selling crypto

  • Choose your preferred destination for your cash: debit card, credit card, bank transfer, or PayPal account.
  • Select your preferred quote and provider available in your region.
  • Sell crypto using MetaMask Portfolio on desktop or the MetaMask app on mobile.

Buy crypto with MetaMask Extension



Click the Buy & Sell button on MetaMask extension to redirect to MetaMask Portfolio. Once there, connect your MetaMask wallet.

  1. Click Move crypto.
  2. Click Sell.
  3. Select your region, and currency — located to the right of your wallet address.
  4. Enter the amount of crypto that you want to sell. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  5. Select the account destination you want. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  6. Select the best real-time quote from our industry-leading providers. You'll be securely redirected to the provider’s website where you may have to share KYC, then directed back to MetaMask Portfolio once you accept the quote.
  7. Return to MetaMask Portfolio and click Send ETH.
  8. Click Confirm to complete the transaction in your MetaMask wallet.

Note: You can click on Sell to keep track of your order as it is processed. Times may vary depending on provider.

Success! 🦊

Buy crypto with MetaMask app



  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask app.
  2. Tap on the menu button‚ which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  3. Tap Sell.
  4. Select your region and currency—this is located to the right of your wallet address.
  5. Enter the crypto amount you want to sell. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  6. Tap Send your cash to and select the account destination you want. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal. Availability will depend on your region.
  7. Tap Get quotes to proceed.
  8. Select the best quote from our industry-leading providers. You'll be securely redirected to the provider’s portal, where you may have to share KYC, then directed back to MetaMask app once you accept the quote.
  9. Review the order summary in your MetaMask app, and tap Confirm to complete the transaction.

Note: You can tap on progress notification to keep track of your order as it is processed. Times may vary depending on provider.

Success! 🦊

**Ready to get started? If you’re on a desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you’re on mobile, download the MetaMask app in the Apple Store or Google Store.

Need more help? We got you. Head to MetaMask Support to speak with our team of experts around-the-clock.

nodes.metaDescription: Sell crypto for cash directly to your debit card, credit card, PayPal, or bank account with MetaMask wallet.

nodes.title: Transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available in MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

image.title: Centralized exchange transfers MetaMask now available
image.description: Centralized exchange transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available on MetaMask.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio now supports centralized exchange (CEX) transfers from Coinbase and Binance, streamlining the process of transferring assets to your crypto wallet.

Many web3 users have digital assets divided across multiple wallets and accounts, creating a fragmented experience. Moving assets from one platform to another can be overly complicated and involve many steps—fraught with the risks of copying and pasting addresses incorrectly, and potential security concerns. MetaMask’s new CEX transfer feature is a solution to this issue, making your wallet more powerful, while also strengthening security.

Instant transfer of assets from centralized exchanges into your MetaMask wallet

MetaMask CEX transfers allow you to immediately move assets between accounts, eliminating the need for manually entering addresses. And, if you have bank accounts linked to your Coinbase or Binance accounts, purchasing crypto directly with your bank account to your MetaMask wallet has never been easier. No additional KYC necessary.

In April 2024, MetaMask partnered with Meld and Mesh to launch a feature that allowed users to track external CEX balances by linking Coinbase or Binance accounts directly from the MetaMask Portfolio dashboard. Now, you can view CEX balances, and also transfer assets from these exchanges into your MetaMask wallet. Neither MetaMask, nor our partners in this integration, will ever have access to your exchange login credentials, or share your wallet addresses with third parties.

CEX transfers will initially support Coinbase or Binance accounts, with expansion to additional exchanges on the horizon. No fees will be charged when transferring digital assets from exchanges to MetaMask. A nominal transaction fee of 0.25% will be applied when transferring from MetaMask to centralized exchanges. Network gas fees also apply.

By bridging the gap between self-custodial and centralized platforms, MetaMask is paving the way for a more powerful, integrated, and user-friendly DeFi ecosystem. Head to MetaMask Portfolio today to get started with CEX transfers.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

nodes.title: How gamers are empowered in web3
nodes.subtitle: Discover the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo
image.description: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo gaming

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. The More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across web3. For Yooldo – a gaming community focused on security and autonomy – MetaMask is essential.

A new era of web3 gaming

In traditional online gaming, players' assets are controlled by the developer or publisher, and stored on centralized servers. This setup leaves users at risk of losing access to their digital items, which can happen for various reasons including a company modifying its policies, or shutting down the game. In web3 gaming, players have full ownership of their digital assets, independent of the game itself. This decentralization ensures that Yooldo gamers have complete control over their assets, with no monolithic authority able to restrict access or manipulate users’ holdings.

How MetaMask keeps gaming assets safe

With self-custody comes gamers' responsibility for maintaining safety of their own assets. The decentralized security that MetaMask offers is vital for Yooldo gamers. Users have control over their private keys, which means that even in the case of a data breach, gaming assets will remain secure. All actions on Yooldo are also transparent and traceable – whether purchasing an in-game asset, or interacting with the platform. And, each transaction requires user approval, via blockchain’s cryptographic validation and consensus protocols.

Another critical feature that safeguards users is phishing protection, powered by MetaMask and ChainPatrol’s Eth-Phishing-Protect. MetaMask provides in-app warnings, and domain verification systems to protect users from dubious links and attacks. This allows Yooldo gamers to be alerted to potentially malicious websites quickly and efficiently.

Empowering gamers through decentralization

As the web3 ecosystem grows, security is of the utmost importance. Gamers can store, buy, sell, and trade their in-game assets directly, without worrying about data breaches, server failures, or third-party interference. More broadly, MetaMask enables players to transfer assets between different games, or wider marketplaces. Digital gaming assets earned in Yooldo can be sold or traded for tokens with real-world value, extending their utility beyond gameplay. No matter where you are in your web3 gaming journey, MetaMask continues to offer more ways to stay secure.

Ready to dive into web3 gaming? Head to Yooldo to get started.

sharedCopy.browserNotSupported: is not supported. Please download a browser that supports MetaMask.
